element.name: TPartialDate
element.short: Date type that allows blank day and month.

descr.p: RomanMonth show the month in roman numbers, if True.
YearFirst show the date as YYYY.MM.DD, if True, or DD.MM.YYYY if False.
ToString format date to string using the parameters.
Today set parameters with today date.

element.name: TPartialDate.ToString
element.short: Displays the date as string, with zeros for blank day or month.
element.descr: Displays date as DD.MM.YYYY. If YearFirst is True, it displays as YYYY.MM.DD.

element.name: TPartialDate.Separator
element.short: Defines the date separator. Period (.) is the default.

element.name: TPartialDate.RomanMonth
element.short: If True (default), displays the month in roman numerals, or zero for blank.

element.name: TDialogPosition
element.short: Type to store position and size.
